org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testing

Class TestingHBaseClusterOption.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testing.TestingHBaseClusterOption.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    TestingHBaseClusterOption

    public static final class TestingHBaseClusterOption.Builder
extends Object
    Builder pattern for creating an TestingHBaseClusterOption. The default values of its fields should be considered public and constant. Changing the default values may cause other tests fail.
